text:
Question 159) After the National Forum Against Piracy (FNCP) include the line of campaign auto parts against forgery, the supervisory agencies announced that the five main fake auto parts products are: bearing, brake pad, steering box, catalyst and shock absorber.
After a major apprehension, the false parts were registered using coding: 1: bearing, 2: brake pad, 3: steering box, 4: catalyst and 5: damper.
At the end the sequence was obtained: 5, 4, 3, 2, 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 4, 3, 2, 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 4, 3, 2, 1, 1, 2, 3, 4, ... which has a formation pattern consisting of repeating a block of numbers. This sequence describes the order in which the seized products were registered.
2 015th registered item was a
A) bearing.
B) catalyst.
C) damper.
D) brake tablet.
E) steering box.
